attributes.value: Finds blind honesty foolish
Sees life as unfair and doesn't mind it that way
Values cooperation
Doesn't respect a society that has settled into harmony without debate and strife
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Believes that the time taken to master a skill is a horrible waste
Sees competition as wasteful and silly
Respects commerce
Values nature
Believes that peace is always preferable to war
Finds the pursuit of knowledge to be a waste of effort
Is rarely jealous
Is dour as a rule
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Is stingy with resources on projects and refuses to expend any extra effort
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Is never moved by the emotions of others
Finds helping others emotionally rewarding
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Is interested only in facts and the real world
A good intellect
The ability to focus
Meager creativity
A very clumsy kinesthetic sense
